fields.summary: Installing Studio dependencies fails when user has never run sudo before

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
h3. Reproduce Steps.
1. Make OSX Factory reset.
2. Install Titanium Studio
3. Launch Titanium Studio
4. When 'Titanium Updates' dialog pop up, click Next Button.
5. You can See 'NodeJS installation Options'. click install radio button & Install button
6. User & password dialog pop up. Input password your os account which  already filed out.
7. User & password dialog pop up again . 
8. try agin , try agin. after several time pop up disappear. 

h3. Expected Result
1. nodeJs installed

h3. Actual Result
1. nodeJS not installed!!!

h3. ...
I'm sure it's CORRECT password!!! But It doesn't work!

But I found a very weired solution.  
1. enable root account and set password root account. (sudo passwd)
2. Run Titanium Studio. Fill out password of root to password dialog.


This is a critical bug to Titanium beginner. Please fix ASAP.
fields.summary: Titanium Studio can't install node. It always shows an invalid password!

comments.body: Thank you for your report. Is this the issue you are facing? TISTUD-6696
